Title: Object: The Honourable Charles Augustus Murray
Description: Portrait of Augustus Murray, three-quarters length seated directed to left, looking round towards the viewer, right hand on his thigh, pointing with the index finger, left hand on his cane, wearing a striped dressing-gown with a tasselled tie around the waist, a soft dark tie with a jewelled tie-pin; with an Indian servant standing beside him to left, holding a book and paper; after Maddox; proof; published state. 1853 Mixed method on chine collé
Curator's comments: For a proof before letters, see 1926,1113.35
Bibliographic references: O'Donoghue 1908-25 / Catalogue of Engraved British Portraits preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (1)
Associated names: Portrait of: Hon Sir Charles Augustus Murray
